titleStmt.title: Dauids strait A sermon preached at Pauls-Crosse, Iuly 8. 1621. By Samuel Buggs Bachelor of Diuinitie, sometime Fellow of Sidney-Sussex Colledge in Cambridge: and now minister of the word of God in Couentrie.
titleStmt.author: Buggs, Samuel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld for Nathanael Butter, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the pyde Bull neare S. Austins Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
